item.title: Sequences and Series of Functions
item.description: This is some content. function fixedPoint(f::Function, x₀, ϵ=0.5E-6, max_iterations=500) x = Vector{Float64}() # Initial seed push!(x,x₀) x_old = x₀ n = 1 while(n < max_iterations) x_new = f(x_old) push!(x,x_new) if(abs(x_new - x_old) < ϵ) return true, x, n, x_new end x_old = x_new n = n + 1 end; return false, x, n, x_old end; The function $f(x) = x^2$
